alert.note: Alert for Finney; Ford; Gray; Haskell; Hodgeman; Meade (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 18 at 10:02PM CDT until May 18 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Ford County in southwestern Kansas... South central Finney County in southwestern Kansas... Southwestern Hodgeman County in southwestern Kansas... Northwestern Meade County in southwestern Kansas... Gray County in southwestern Kansas... Northern Haskell County in southwestern Kansas... * Until 1045 PM CDT. * At 1002 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles northeast of Charleston to near Copeland, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * These severe thunderstorms will remain over mainly rural areas of western Ford, south central Finney, southwestern Hodgeman, northwestern Meade, Gray and northern Haskell Counties. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Finney; Ford; Gray; Haskell; Hodgeman; Meade
